Added an /emergency endpoint and an EmergencyRequest model:

- POST /emergency expects body

{ "number": "+1123456789",
and returns {"status":"sent",

"message": "Call me now!" }
. .. } while logging the event into history. json.

Server now covers the PDF's emergency-alert requirement. Restart Uvicorn and test:

bash O) Copy

uvicorn excuse_api:app -—-reload

curl -X POST http://127.0.0.1:8000/emergency \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{"number":"+1123456789", "message":"Call me now!"}'
